name: Piles (PatStar)
description:
Rise to the top, by piling up unstable stacks of breakable objects, trying to reach the goal.

In 7 cartoony levels it is your task to find a way from the starting point to the end point by connecting them with piles of unstable junk.

Played with mouse. Use left click to grab and drag objects.

Made for Ludum Dare 49 compo
